title: Big Cypress National Preserve: Permitted Commercial Service Operators
body: Permitted Commercial Services Operators       The following are authorized permitted companies that provide visitor services within the national preserve. All permittees and their guides are required to have a copy of signed permit and conditions available for inspection by a park ranger at all times when operating within Big Cypress. Captain Steve's Swamp Buggy Adventure Turner River Unit Swamp buggy tours www.captainstevesswampbuggyadventures.com Steven Markley PO Box 663 Chokoloskee, FL 34138 (239) 695-2186 (239) 325-7171 markley.steve@yahoo.com C&G's Big Cypress Swamp Buggy Tours Inactive at this time Turner River Unit Swamp buggy tours www.bigcypressswampbuggytours.com Glenda & Chris Hancock PO Box 68 Chokoloskee, FL 34138 (239) 695-4756 swampbuggytours@gmail.com  Everglades Adventure Tours Turner River/Ochopee prairie pole boat tours & livery, shuttle services Includes launching from Dona Drive
